name: Avoid using regular expressions
description: This quality rules searches for all the Methods and Functions  and Sections using regular expressions.
output:
This report lists all the Methods, Functions and PHP Sections using regular expressions.
This QR provides the following information:
Methods, Functions and PHP Sections full name.
rationale: It is highly advised to limit the use of the regular expressions. There are known to be much slower than their php counterparts. For example use str_replace instead of preg_replace.
remediation: Try to reduce the use of regular expressions.Use insead functions as str_replace.
sample:
<?php

if (preg_match("/php/i", "PHP is the web scripting language of choice.")) { // VIOLATION
    echo "A match was found.";
} else {
    echo "A match was not found.";
}
?>
